content.text:
[@punkmonk](@EaYYQo5nAQRabB9nxAn5i2uiIZ665b90Qk2U/WHNVE8=.ed25519) 

Yeah, I'd love to see a system like:

- A one-time payment of $1200 or something for a permissive license to use patchbutt@1.2.3
- If you continue paying $100/mo you continue to get permissive licenses for all new releases of patchbutt
- When you stop paying you [of course] retain the licenses you paid for
